text: Pšajnovica (; in older sources also Pišajnovica,Leksikon občin kraljestev in dežel zastopanih v državnem zboru, vol. 6: Kranjsko. 1906. Vienna: C. Kr. Dvorna in Državna Tiskarna, p. 24. ) is a small settlement in the Tuhinj Valley in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==Church== Saint Leonard's Church The local church is dedicated to Saint Leonard.Journal of the Slovene Archive Association, Arhivi Vol. 29 (2006) No. 2, pp. 305–336 ==References== ==External links== * *Pšajnovica at Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Pšajnovica
